replies.msg:
椰菜可以話係最平既菜 所以啲餐廳先咁鐘意用佢
但眾所鳩知椰菜濕熱又難食 永遠都係凍既
生菜好食但係貴
如果你係老細 你會
用生菜但加價
用椰菜

用生菜唔加價
如果做到老細的話

用椰菜唔係因為平 係因為可以放好耐都唔變質無咁易出水

你試下生菜放耐左會點

用椰菜唔係因為平 係因為可以放好耐都唔變質無咁易出水

你試下生菜放耐左會點

但係好食 應該日日清

椰菜好難食

未必嘅
煲羅宋湯, 回鍋肉
兩舊都係屎，點揀呀

How do you usually prepare vegetables? For me I usually plug the plughole (drain) in the kitchen sink and full it with water. Then soak the veggies for fifteen minutes. Rinse them with water afterwards. If you wanna cook with green peppers, you can leave diced green peppers to soak overnight or soak them in red wine for ten minutes. If you accidentally spill red wine on your shirt you can usually soak out the red wine stain by leaving it in water. In centuries past, only the aristocrats were entitled to learn to play the piano and the violin. Unlike the past, pianists and violinists are thick on the ground nowadays. My friend Mary is a very thoughtful and kind woman. Good women like her are thin on the ground. She asked me if I could teach her a magic trick. I them said "what's it worth?" Do you enjoy indoor or outdoor pursuits more? I think you have lots of opportunities for leisure pursuits. If you wanna empty the trash on your computer, right-click the trash in the bottom left hand corner of the screen and empty it. If you wanna check out the properties of your computer, click the apple icon in top right hand corner of the screen. What perfume are you using? Do you spray yourself with perfume every day? Some people prefer to dab some perfume on their skin while others prefer to put a few drops on their clothes. How do you spike hair in the front? For me, I usually tell my hairdresser to shave my hair at the sides same gel it on top. At home, I use clay and move my fingers towards the back of my hair while setting them erect at the same time. As I do so, I clench my fingers around my hair for the hair to settle, lifting my strands up. I also use a spray to hold it up afterwards.
